ing: 2 cups fresh seasonal berries (strawberries, blueberries, whatever you like)
n: Cinnamon Acai Smoothie with TruviaÂ® Natural Sweetener
des: "Enjoy the antioxidants contained in blueberries, strawberries, cocoa and cinnamon blended with acai juice in this powerfully delicious smoothie.  The guilt-free addition of TruviaÂ® natural sweetener reduces the sugar and calories so you can enjoy this satisfying infusion of goodness."
